name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation. Designed for immersive sound and long comfort sessions.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Touch-sensitive lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature. Perfect for study or workspace lighting.

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description: Compact speaker with deep bass and 12-hour battery life. Water-resistant and ideal for outdoor fun.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Adjustable mesh chair with lumbar support and 360° swivel. Built for long work-from-home hours.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: Ultra-responsive mouse with RGB lighting and programmable buttons. Optimized for speed and precision.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard
description: RGB backlit keyboard with tactile blue switches. Built for durability and a satisfying typing experience.

name: 4K Action Camera
description: Compact waterproof camera with 170° wide lens. Records high-quality video for travel and adventure.

name: Smart Fitness Band
description: Tracks heart rate, sleep, and steps with long battery life. Syncs seamlessly with your phone.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast-charging Qi pad for phones and earbuds. Sleek design fits any desk setup.

name: Mini Air Purifier
description: Removes dust and allergens from small spaces. Whisper-quiet operation ideal for bedrooms.

name: USB-C Multiport Hub
description: 7-in-1 hub with HDMI, USB, and SD card ports. Perfect for laptops and creators on the go.

name: Smart Home Plug
description: Wi-Fi plug to control appliances via mobile app or voice assistant. Simple setup and scheduling options.

name: Portable SSD 1TB
description: Super-fast external SSD for data transfer and backup. Shock-resistant and compact for travel.

name: Noise-Isolating Earbuds
description: In-ear design for deep bass and secure fit. Includes charging case with LED battery indicator.

name: Smartwatch Pro Series
description: AMOLED display, fitness tracking, and Bluetooth calls. Water-resistant and stylish for everyday use.

name: Laptop Cooling Pad
description: Dual-fan cooling pad reduces heat during intense work or gaming. Adjustable height and LED lights.

name: Compact Bluetooth Keyboard
description: Slim wireless keyboard with silent keys and long battery life. Works with laptops, tablets, and TVs.

name: Foldable Laptop Stand
description: Aluminium stand improves posture and airflow. Lightweight and portable for easy use anywhere.

name: Smart Security Camera
description: 1080p HD indoor camera with motion detection and night vision. Connects to your smartphone app.

name: Wi-Fi Range Extender
description: Boosts your home network coverage. Simple setup via WPS and dual-band connectivity.

name: Smart Coffee Maker
description: App-controlled coffee maker with auto-brew schedules. Brews perfect coffee every morning.

name: Electric Kettle
description: Stainless steel kettle with auto shut-off and 1.7L capacity. Fast boiling and energy-efficient.

name: Smart Light Strip
description: RGB LED light strip with app control and music sync. Great for room ambience and decor.

name: Wireless Power Bank 10000mAh
description: Portable charger supports fast wired and wireless charging. Sleek matte design for easy carry.

name: Mini Projector
description: Pocket-sized projector for movies and games. Connects to phone or laptop with HDMI input.

name: Bluetooth Car Adapter
description: Turns any car stereo into a Bluetooth system. Supports hands-free calls and music streaming.

name: Smart Door Lock
description: Fingerprint and PIN-enabled smart lock. Secure, easy to install, and smartphone compatible.

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Auto-navigating robot that vacuums and mops. Controlled via mobile app or voice command.

name: Smart Mirror
description: Touch-enabled mirror displays weather, time, and reminders. Stylish and futuristic home accessory.

name: Portable Monitor 15.6"
description: Full HD external display for laptops and consoles. Slim and lightweight with Type-C input.

name: Wireless Webcam 1080p
description: High-quality webcam with noise-canceling mic. Perfect for online meetings and streaming.

name: Smart Air Humidifier
description: Adds moisture and fragrance to air. LED light ring adds a relaxing glow for bedrooms.

name: Electric Toothbrush
description: Rechargeable toothbrush with 3 brushing modes. Helps maintain oral hygiene effectively.

name: Smart Alarm Clock
description: LED clock with Bluetooth speaker and sunrise simulation. Helps you wake naturally.

name: VR Headset
description: Lightweight headset for immersive VR experiences. Compatible with most smartphones.

name: Smart Baby Monitor
description: HD video feed and motion alerts for parents. Two-way audio and night vision built in.

name: Smart Scale
description: Digital weighing scale with body composition tracking. Syncs data with mobile health apps.

name: Electric Standing Desk
description: Height-adjustable desk with memory presets. Promotes comfort and productivity at work.

name: Smart Water Bottle
description: Tracks your hydration and reminds you to drink. Glows subtly when it's time to sip.

name: Noise Meter Sensor
description: Detects and logs noise levels for monitoring environments. Ideal for IoT demos.

name: Solar Power Bank
description: Charges via sunlight or USB. Great for outdoor travel and emergencies.

name: Smart Plug Strip
description: 4-outlet Wi-Fi power strip with surge protection. Each socket can be controlled individually.

name: Mini Drone
description: Compact drone with HD camera and easy controls. Great for beginners and hobbyists.

name: Bluetooth Tracker Tag
description: Attach to keys or wallet and find them via mobile app. Has replaceable battery and alert tone.

name: Smart Pet Feeder
description: Automatic food dispenser with mobile control. Keeps pets fed on schedule.

name: Electric Scooter
description: Foldable e-scooter with LED display and long range. Fun, eco-friendly urban transport.

name: 3D Printing Pen
description: Draw 3D models easily using PLA filament. Great for DIY creators and students.

name: Smart Doorbell
description: Wi-Fi video doorbell with two-way talk. Sends notifications to your phone instantly.

name: Wireless Charging Clock
description: Alarm clock that doubles as a wireless phone charger. Minimalist design for bedside tables.

name: AI Personal Assistant Speaker
description: Smart voice assistant speaker for controlling devices and answering queries. Great for connected homes.
